title: These Regulations shall only be applicable for development undertaken under "Pradhan Mantri Awas Yojana‖ wherein all the tenements shall be constructed for EWS / LIG with the use of latest technology, subject to condition no
clause_text: These Regulations shall only be applicable for development undertaken under "Pradhan Mantri Awas Yojana‖ wherein all the tenements shall be constructed for EWS / LIG with the use of latest technology, subject to condition no.3 herein below.
